section.name: What's this?
section.p: In java.net, a person with the observer role can post a bug report but he cannot add comments / attachments to a bug. While managing a project, I noticed that this causes a lot of confusion among bug submitters.
This tool eases the pain by automatically granting a certain role to everyone who submits a bug. Typically, this role will have the "modify issues" permission.
